Write a story or poem about a bird who has lost its ability to fly due to fear or lack of confidence.
Create a painting or drawing of a bird that has fallen from the sky and is struggling to find its wings.
Write a song or melody that captures the feeling of a bird who has lost its flight.
Create a sculpture or three-dimensional art piece that represents a bird that has lost its ability to fly.
Write a script for a short film or play that follows the journey of a bird who is trying to regain its ability to fly.
